tag_list: rostin-ventures, seo-consulting, mobile-seo, mobile-search-marketing, search-engine-marketing, search-marketing, social-media-marketing, video-seo, local-seo, dallas-seo, reverse-seo, online-reputation-management, online-brand-management, social-media-out
overview:
President, Marketing of Rostin Ventures, Julie Ross works with emerging technologies to build brand awareness through search engine optimization.

Rostin Ventures represents clients across industries, services and offerings. The company represents business to business and business to consumer focused markets. An early adopter of online and mobile marketing technology, Rostin Ventures builds search engine optimization within Google, Yahoo, Bing, YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, Linked In and other social media marketing networks, for the purpose of online brand management.

The SEM SEO Expert Strategy and Mobile SEO Pro Formula use video marketing, article marketing, social media marketing, and best practices in SEO consulting. Clients enjoy up to 100% market share of the first page of search engine results online and in mobile search marketing, increased brand awareness, increased traffic, leads, sales and profit in business ventures.

Rostin Ventures clients are active outreach program contributors. Their contributions to local and national efforts make a difference. Social Media Outreach leverages social networks and communities to build interest and involvement for local and national causes.
